mapper.select: SELECT plaza_id, title, plaza_category_id, content, SUBSTR(user_id, 1, 3) || RPAD('*', LENGTH(user_id) - 3, '*') AS userId FROM plaza WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY plaza_id DESC

SELECT plaza_id, title, plaza_category_id, content, SUBSTR(user_id, 1, 3) || RPAD('*', LENGTH(user_id) - 3, '*') AS userId FROM plaza WHERE plaza_category_id = #{category} AND status = 0 ORDER BY plaza_id DESC
SELECT name ,plaza_id, title, content, is_author_public, plaza_category_id FROM plaza p JOIN users u ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE plaza_id = #{seq} AND p.status = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consulting ( investment_amount, desired_opening_date, store_area, personal_info_consent, content, name, tel, time, email, preferred_region, zipcode, address, status ) VALUES ( #{investmentAmount}, #{desiredOpeningDate}, #{storeArea}, #{personalInfoConsent}, #{content}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{time}, #{email}, #{preferredRegion}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, 0 )
INSERT INTO plaza_file (plaza_file_id, plaza_id, file_name, orig_name) VALUES (PLAZA_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{plazaId}, #{fileName}, #{origName})
mapper.select: SELECT p.plaza_id, p.title, p.plaza_category_id, p.content, SUBSTR(p.user_id, 1, 3) || RPAD('*', LENGTH(p.user_id) - 3, '*') user_id, CASE WHEN pl.like_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END liked FROM plaza p LEFT JOIN plaza_like pl ON pl.plaza_id = p.plaza_id AND pl.user_id = #{loginUserId} WHERE p.status = 0 ORDER BY p.plaza_id DESC

SELECT p.plaza_id, p.title, p.plaza_category_id, p.content, SUBSTR(p.user_id, 1, 3) || RPAD('*', LENGTH(p.user_id) - 3, '*') user_id, CASE WHEN pl.like_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END liked FROM plaza p LEFT JOIN plaza_like pl ON pl.plaza_id = p.plaza_id AND pl.user_id = #{loginUserId} WHERE p.plaza_category_id = #{categoryId} AND p.status = 0 ORDER BY p.plaza_id DESC

SELECT u.name, p.plaza_id, p.title, p.content, p.is_author_public, p.plaza_category_id, CASE WHEN pl.like_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END liked FROM plaza p JOIN users u ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN plaza_like pl ON pl.plaza_id = p.plaza_id AND pl.user_id = #{loginUserId} WHERE p.plaza_id = #{seq} AND p.status = 0
SELECT consulting_id, name, tel, email, preferred_region, status FROM consulting ORDER BY consulting_id DESC

SELECT consulting_id, investment_amount, desired_opening_date, store_area, personal_info_consent, content, name, tel, time, email, preferred_region, zipcode, address, status FROM consulting WHERE consulting_id = #{consultingId}
SELECT u.name, p.plaza_id, p.title, p.content, p.is_author_public, p.plaza_category_id, p.status FROM plaza p JOIN users u ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.plaza_id = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plaza_like (like_id, plaza_id, user_id) VALUES (PLAZA_LIKE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{plazaId}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM plaza_like WHERE plaza_id=#{plazaId} AND user_id=#{userId}
